mapper.select: select jg."name" as groupname from jhta01_schedule js inner join jhta01_group jg on js.group_id = jg.id where js.id = #{id}

select js.id, js.group_id as groupID, jg."name" as groupname, js.editor,js.title, js."content",js.start_date as startDate, js.end_date as endDate from jhta01_schedule js left join jhta01_group jg on js.group_id = jg.id where js.group_id = (select group_id from jhta01_follow where username = #{username}) or js.group_id isnull
mapper.update: update jhta01_schedule set title = #{title}, "content" = #{content}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
